song.title: Give Me Faith
song.lyrics:
[V] .G D Em I need You to soften my heart . C To break me apart . G D I need You to pierce through the dark . Em C And cleanse every part of me
[P] .Em C D All I am .Em C D I surrender
[C] .C G D Em Give me faith to trust what You say .C G Em D Am That You're good and Your love is great . C G D C D I'm broken inside, I give You my life
---
[Instrumental] .C G Em D
[B] .C G I may be weak .D Em Your spirit strong in me .C G My flesh may fail .Em D My God You never will
song.presentation: V P C V P C B C
